"Highly recommend Luna's Fencing for their top-notch service and quality work." "For us, the price was well worth the quality and efficacy of the work." "Keep up the good work👍🏽 Sincerely NJ Carter A Well Pleased Customer👏🏽👏🏽👏🏽"

Luna Fencing was outstanding to work with from the quote to the very end. We has an automatic gate fence and balcony railings installed and they both looked great. I am impressed with their attention to detail sending picture and staying in … More

H&A Luna's provided a high-quality product in very little time. They took time to meet and understand our fencing needs and were upfront and transparent with cost. For us, the price was well worth the quality and efficacy of the work. I would certainly use them again and recommend them to others. Response from the owner a year ago Thank you for the review, was a pleasure working for you!

Excellent work by the H&A Luna team. There was a quick response when I called to inquire about replacing our back fence.  When we signed the contract the fence was completed in record time.  Ruben and the gentleman (sorry I forgot his name) … More
